contents.text: Welcome to Pramp, based in San Francisco, your platform for live coding interview practice.
For individual coding interview scheduling and support, press 1.
To schedule or reschedule a mock interview session, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our scheduling team.

navigationGoals: I need to book a mock coding interview for early next week.
I want to schedule a mock coding interview session to prepare for a software engineering role.
I’d like to book a mock coding interview slot next Tuesday at 3 PM PST.
I need to set up or change a mock coding interview appointment.
I’d like to schedule a new mock coding interview next week around my lab schedule.

contents.text: For technical assistance with your account or session, press 2.
One moment please, we are connecting you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I can’t join my scheduled session due to a technical error—please help me fix it.
I need help resolving technical issues with my mock interview setup.
I’m experiencing WebRTC latency in my live session and need troubleshooting.
I’m having trouble with my account and need help joining my session.
I’m having trouble with my Pramp session—the code editor won’t load.

contents.text: For corporate training and enterprise solutions, press 2.
To learn about enterprise plans and bulk licensing, press 1.
Please hold while we retrieve information about our enterprise offerings.

navigationGoals: I’d like pricing and details on enterprise plans and bulk licensing for my team of 20 engineers.
I’m looking for information on group licensing plans for my veteran support organization.
I want details on enterprise bulk licensing and SSO integration.
I’d like details on enterprise training packages and bulk discounts.
I need pricing details for group mock interviews for our physics study group.

contents.text: To speak with our corporate sales team, press 2.
Thank you for your patience; we are now connecting you to a corporate sales representative.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a sales rep to discuss custom corporate training solutions.
I want to speak with a sales representative to discuss enterprise training packages for my team.
I need to discuss custom enterprise pricing with a corporate sales rep.
I want to speak directly with someone about purchasing corporate licenses.
I want to speak with someone about enterprise training packages for my department.
